Package org.mcm.sws.strategy

Provides different strategies, i.e. ways of using AI planners to achieve the specified goal.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PlanningStrategy Interface to strategies of Web Service composition (cf. white paper)
 

Class Summary
ExecutionMonitoringReplanning  
SubplanBasedReplanning This class implements the SubPlan based sensing and replanning method as outlined in the WSPlan paper at http://elektra.mcm.unisg.ch/pbwsc/docs/ppswr04.pdf.
 

Package org.mcm.sws.strategy Description

Provides different strategies, i.e. ways of using AI planners to achieve the specified goal.
